places.name: Victoria Memorial
places.description: A grand marble building dedicated to Queen Victoria, now a museum.

places.name: Howrah Bridge
places.description: A famous cantilever bridge over the Hooghly River, connecting Kolkata and Howrah.

places.name: Indian Museum
places.description: One of the oldest museums in India, showcasing a vast collection of artifacts and exhibits.

places.name: Marble Palace
places.description: A beautiful mansion with a collection of art and antiques.

places.name: Belur Math
places.description: The headquarters of the Ramakrishna Math and Mission, known for its architectural beauty.

places.name: Dakshineswar Kali Temple
places.description: A famous temple dedicated to Goddess Kali, located on the banks of the Hooghly River.

places.name: Alipore Zoo
places.description: One of the oldest zoos in India, home to a variety of animals and birds.

places.name: Kalighat Kali Temple
places.description: A famous temple dedicated to Goddess Kali, located in the Kalighat area.

places.name: Science City
places.description: A large science park with interactive exhibits and educational displays.

places.name: New Town Eco Park
places.description: A large urban park with various recreational facilities and green spaces.

places.name: NICCO Park
places.description: A popular amusement park with thrilling rides and attractions for all ages.

places.name: Esplanade Bus Stop
places.description: A major bus terminal in central Kolkata.
